applications.name: Microsoft Teams
applications.description: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform for chat, meetings, calls, and file sharing in workplaces. It includes accessibility features like screen reader support, keyboard navigation, live captions, and high contrast modes for inclusive communication.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Period together to open keyboard shortcuts reference showing all available shortcuts.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce shortcuts dialog opened. Search or browse shortcuts by category.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and E together to move focus to search box for finding messages, people, and files.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce search box focused. Type to search across Teams content.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and 1 together to navigate to Activity feed showing notifications and mentions.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Activity feed opened. Shows recent notifications and @mentions.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and 2 together to navigate to Chat view showing your conversations.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Chat opened with list of conversations.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and 3 together to navigate to Teams view showing your teams and channels.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Teams section opened. Shows list of teams and channels.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and 4 together to navigate to Calendar view showing meetings and appointments.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Calendar opened. Navigate events with arrow keys.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and 5 together to navigate to Calls view showing call history and dial pad.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Calls section opened. Access call history and make calls.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and 6 together to navigate to Files view showing shared files.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Files section opened. Navigate shared documents.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Comma together to open Settings dialog for configuring Teams preferences.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Settings opened. Configure notifications, devices, accessibility, and more.

shortcuts.description: Press F1 to open Help panel with support articles and troubleshooting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Help panel opened. Search help topics or browse categories.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and N together to start a new chat conversation with a person or group.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce new chat dialog. Type name to search and add people.

shortcuts.description: Press C to place focus in the compose box for typing a new message.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce compose box focused. Start typing your message.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and X together to expand compose box to full editor with formatting options.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce expanded editor opened. Access rich text formatting tools.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Enter together to send the message you're currently composing.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce message sent. Message appears in conversation thread.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and O together to attach a file to your message from computer or cloud storage.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce file picker dialog. Select file to attach to message.

shortcuts.description: Press Shift and Enter together to insert a new line in message without sending.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce new line. Continue typing on next line.

shortcuts.description: Press R to reply to selected message in a conversation thread.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce reply compose box opened. Focus placed in reply field.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and U together to mark selected chat as unread for later attention.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce chat marked as unread. Chat appears bold in list.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and F together to filter messages by type or sender.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce filter options. Select criteria to narrow message view.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and B together to make selected text bold in your message.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers may announce bold formatting applied.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and I together to italicize selected text in your message.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers may announce italic formatting applied.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and U together to underline selected text in your message.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers may announce underline formatting applied.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and U together to start a video call with current chat participants.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce video call starting. Participants receive notification.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and C together to start an audio-only call with current chat participants.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce audio call starting.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and A together to accept an incoming video call.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce joining call. Video call window opens.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and S together to accept an incoming audio-only call.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce joining audio call.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and D together to decline an incoming call.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce call declined. Caller notified you're unavailable.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and M together to mute or unmute your microphone during call.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce microphone muted or unmuted. Essential control for meetings.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and O together to turn your camera on or off during video call.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce camera turned on or off.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and E together to start or stop sharing your screen with meeting participants.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce screen sharing dialog. Select window or full screen to share.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and K together to raise or lower your hand to get attention in meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce hand raised or lowered. Notifies presenters you have question.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and P together to blur or unblur your background during video call.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce background blur toggled. Provides privacy for home environments.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and Y together to view and admit participants waiting in lobby.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce lobby panel. Select participants to admit to meeting.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and Enter together to open meeting chat panel for text communication.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce chat panel opened. Type messages visible to all participants.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and H together to hang up and leave the current meeting or call.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce leaving meeting. Call ends for you, continues for others.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and F together to enter or exit fullscreen mode for meeting window.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce fullscreen mode toggled.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and P together to show or hide participants list panel.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce participants panel shown or hidden. View list of attendees.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and Space together to show meeting control bar with mute, video, share options.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce controls visible. Access mute, video, and other controls.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and C during meeting to enable live captions showing real-time speech-to-text.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce live captions enabled. Captions appear at bottom of meeting window. Essential for deaf and hard of hearing users.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Equals together to increase zoom level making interface elements larger.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers may announce zoom level. Helpful for users with low vision.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Minus together to decrease zoom level making interface smaller.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers may announce zoom level.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Zero together to reset zoom to default one hundred percent.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce zoom reset to default.

shortcuts.context: When dialog or panel is open
shortcuts.description: Press Escape to close current dialog, panel, or cancel current action.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce dialog closed. Returns focus to previous location.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and S together to download the currently open file to your computer.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce download started. File saves to default downloads folder.
